sqlQuery.name: OrfMotifFiles
sqlQuery.sql: WITH orgs as (select distinct organism, project_id from ApidbTuning.GenomicSeqAttributes UNION -- GiardiaDB uses species for everything select distinct species, project_id from ApidbTuning.TranscriptAttributes where project_id = 'GiardiaDB' UNION -- Mitochondrial GENES and GENOME select distinct organism || ' mitochondrial', project_id from ApidbTuning.GenomicSeqAttributes where so_id = 'SO:0000819' UNION -- Plastid GENES and GENOME select distinct organism || ' plastid' as organism, project_id from ApidbTuning.GenomicSeqAttributes where so_id = 'SO:0001259' ) select distinct nvl(ot.term, files.term) as term, case when ot.organism is null then files.parentterm else ot.parentterm end as parentterm, case when (ot.organism is null or ( ot.organism is not null and ot.term = files.term)) then '@WEBSERVICEMIRROR@' || '/' || ot.project_id || '/build-%%buildNumber%%/' || files.abbreviation || '/motif/ORFs_AA.fasta' else '-1' end as internal from apidbtuning.organismtree ot, (select abbrev.organism as term, abbrev.parent as parentTerm, abbrev.abbreviation from orgs, apidbtuning.organismabbreviationws abbrev where orgs.organism = abbrev.organism and (orgs.project_id = '@PROJECT_ID@' OR 'EuPathDB' = '@PROJECT_ID@') ) files where files.term = ot.organism (+) order by parentterm,term

sqlQuery.name: GenomicMotifFiles
sqlQuery.sql: with orgs as (select distinct organism, project_id from ApidbTuning.GenomicSeqAttributes UNION select distinct species, project_id from ApidbTuning.TranscriptAttributes where project_id = 'GiardiaDB' UNION -- Mitochondrial GENES and GENOME select distinct organism || ' mitochondrial', project_id from ApidbTuning.GenomicSeqAttributes where so_id = 'SO:0000819' UNION -- Plastid GENES and GENOME select distinct organism || ' plastid' as organism, project_id from ApidbTuning.GenomicSeqAttributes where so_id = 'SO:0001259' ) select distinct nvl(ot.term, files.term) as term, case when ot.organism is null then files.parentterm else ot.parentterm end as parentterm, case when (ot.organism is null or ( ot.organism is not null and ot.term = files.term)) then '@WEBSERVICEMIRROR@' || '/' || ot.project_id || '/build-%%buildNumber%%/' || files.abbreviation || '/motif/GenomeDoubleStrand.fasta' else '-1' end as internal from apidbtuning.organismtree ot, (select abbrev.organism as term, abbrev.parent as parentTerm, abbrev.abbreviation from orgs, apidbtuning.organismabbreviationws abbrev where orgs.organism = abbrev.organism and (orgs.project_id = '@PROJECT_ID@' OR 'EuPathDB' = '@PROJECT_ID@') ) files where files.term = ot.organism (+) order by parentterm,term

sqlQuery.name: AnnotatedProteinMotifFiles
sqlQuery.sql: with orgs as ( select distinct organism, project_id from ApidbTuning.TranscriptAttributes where ( gene_type = 'protein coding' and organism not in ('Toxoplasma gondii RH') ) UNION -- TrichDB Repeat Genes select distinct organism || ' (Repeated Genes)', project_id from ApidbTuning.TranscriptAttributes where project_id = 'TrichDB' UNION -- GiardiaDB uses species for everything select distinct species, project_id from ApidbTuning.TranscriptAttributes where project_id = 'GiardiaDB' UNION -- Mitochondrial GENES select distinct organism || ' mitochondrial', project_id from ApidbTuning.GenomicSeqAttributes where so_id = 'SO:0000819' UNION -- Plastid GENES select distinct organism || ' plastid' as organism, project_id from ApidbTuning.GenomicSeqAttributes where so_id = 'SO:0001259' ) select distinct nvl(ot.term, files.term) as term, case when ot.organism is null then files.parentterm else ot.parentterm end as parentterm, case when (ot.organism is null or ( ot.organism is not null and ot.term = files.term)) then '@WEBSERVICEMIRROR@' || '/' || files.project_id || '/build-%%buildNumber%%/' || files.abbreviation || '/motif/AnnotatedProteins.fasta' else '-1' end as internal from apidbtuning.organismtree ot, (select abbrev.organism as term, abbrev.parent as parentTerm, abbrev.abbreviation , orgs.project_id from orgs, apidbtuning.organismabbreviationws abbrev where orgs.organism = abbrev.organism and (orgs.project_id = '@PROJECT_ID@' OR ('EuPathDB' = '@PROJECT_ID@' AND NOT abbrev.project_id ='HostDB')) ) files where files.term = ot.organism (+) order by parentTerm,Term
